column1: DESCRIBES HOW TO PREPARE A SEWING PROJECT
DOCUMENTS HOW TO WORK WITH MACHINE
column4: You do not need to show all the steps... you can say:
"I followed these steps in setting up the machine..." and link to a video, student page, or instructable on
the setup for that specific machine. You should add detail to by taking photos and documenting specific settings,
elements, or issues that you need to remember for the next time you use the machine.
